name: Robert W. Doran
content: Bobs Home Page Bob Doran's Home Page I have been with the department since 1982. I am now retired and am regarded as a Professor Emeritus, but I continue to work in the department as a tutor. I have also worked in the past at City University London, Massey University, and atÂ  Amdahl Corporation, California (as computer architect). My computing interests are in computer architecture, history of computing, parallel algorithms and programming. But I also have many interests other than work. For further information. Addresses Department of Computer Science The University of Auckland 38 Princes Street Private Bag 92019 Auckland New Zealand. Room 123 Phone: +64 (9) 3737-999 Extension 8754 FAX: +64 (9) 3737-453 Email: b_doran@cs.auckland.ac.nz
